name: Bolchalk FReY Marketing
tagline: We're the Team with the BIG Ideas!
description:
Established in 1964, BolchalkFReY Marketing is the most experienced advertising and public relations agency in Southern Arizona.
We provide a full range of design, marketing, advertising and public relations services to over 500 companies, governmental agencies, and nonprofit organizations. Our extensive work has been recognized with more than 350 national, regional and local creative excellence awards representing work in digital, broadcast, print, outdoor and trade show exhibits.
